snippet: Cabula6 brought its three-part film-based performance-lecture series, “The Angola Project,” to Dance New Amsterdam.
abstract: Claudia La Rocco reviews dance performance by Jeremy Xido and his company Cabula6 at Dance New Amsterdam.
lead_paragraph: Cabula6 brought its three-part film-based performance-lecture series, “The Angola Project,” to Dance New Amsterdam.

headline.seo: Cabula6’s ‘Angola Project’ at Dance New Amsterdam
headline.main: With Little Movement, Visiting Several Continents
headline.print_headline: With Little Movement, Visiting Several Continents
